alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Colquitt; Dougherty; Early; Lee; Mitchell; Randolph; Terrell; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 8:00AM EDT until June 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Western Turner County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 900 AM EDT. * At 759 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dawson to 6 miles southwest of Leary to 7 miles southwest of Arlington to 7 miles northwest of Donalsonville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Morgan, Albany, Dawson, Putney, Sylvester, Leesburg, Arlington, Baconton, Poulan, Doerun, Leary, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Douglasville, Worth, Terrell and Centerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Colquitt; Dougherty; Early; Lee; Mitchell; Randolph; Terrell; Turner; Worth
